title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Terrorist Cell and Hezbollah Infrastructure in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report on Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a terrorist cell in Lebanese territory

Earlier today, an Air Force aircraft attacked a terrorist cell in the Hanita area.

In addition, IDF forces attacked a Hezbollah terrorist infrastructure in Lebanese territory with tank fire.

Also, IDF forces carried out artillery fire to remove a threat in the Yaron area.

Following alerts about the penetration of a hostile aircraft in the north of the country, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspected airborne target that crossed from Lebanese territory into Israeli territory using the “Iron Dome” system.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/48g8Osk
